summary: AN ORDINANCE creating a new Office for Civil Rights by consolidating the Human Rights Department and the Office for Women's Rights; amending numerous Municipal Code Sections in Title 4 and chapters 3.14, 3.22, 3.110, 6.212, 14.04, 14.08, 20.46 and 20.46A of the Seattle Municipal Code; recodifying or repealing various sections in those chapters; and making grammatical and typographical corrections to amended sections.
